name.title: Dataset name
name.description: Name of the group (no version number). Lowercase with underscores.

link.title: Link (deprecated)
link.description: Link to website displaying the dataset

production.title: Is production
production.description: Whether this dataset should be shown in production

downloadRoot.title: Download root
downloadRoot.description: Root url for downloading cell data

default.description: Default feature key for the setting

exclude.description: Optional list of feature keys to exclude

featuresDisplayOrder.title: Feature display order
featuresDisplayOrder.description: Ordered array of feature keys for display on front end

featuresDataOrder.title: Feature data order
featuresDataOrder.description: Ordered array of feature keys for packing and unpacking data

input-dateCreated.title: Date the dataset was created
input-dateCreated.description: Format: Month Day, Year. If it's not specified, the date will be set to the upload date.

input-datasets.title: Input datasets
input-datasets.description: Array of subfolder names that point to each dataset in the group. Each subfolder should contain their own `dataset.json`.

input-image.title: Image file
input-image.description: Relative path to the dataset card image file, including filename.

input-featuresDataPath.title: Feature data path
input-featuresDataPath.description: Relative path to the per cell data json, including filename.

input-featureDefsPath.title: Feature defs path
input-featureDefsPath.description: Relative path to the feature definition file, including filename.

input-viewerSettingsPath.title: Viewer settings path
input-viewerSettingsPath.description: Relative path to image per-channel settings file for the 3d viewer, including filename.

input-albumPath.title: Album path
input-albumPath.description: Relative path to the album file.

processed-image.title: Image file
processed-image.description: Url of the dataset card image file on AWS

processed-featuresDataPath.title: Feature data path
processed-featuresDataPath.description: Url of the features JSON on AWS

processed-featureDefsPath.title: Feature defs path
processed-featureDefsPath.description: Database path to feature definition collection

processed-viewerSettingsPath.title: Viewer settings path
processed-viewerSettingsPath.description: Url of the per-channel settings file for the 3d viewer on AWS.
